title: Murder at Sea of Passenger X
description: Georgie Shaw and her handsome new husband, Detective Jack Wheeler, are living it up on Marvelous Marley World's luxurious cruise ship when trouble strikes. A passenger, dubbed Passenger X because his identity is unknown, falls overboard. Is this related to the rash of jewelry thefts or the murder of another passenger? Georgie and Jack are determined to get to the bottom of things before the ship reaches Tahiti where Max Marley is waiting and demanding answers.USA Today and Wall Street Journal bestselling author, Anna Celeste Burke, brings you murder, mayhem, and a second chance at love!Grab Your Copy Today!Free to read with Kindle UnlimitedRecipes Included5*****”Ms Burke keeps the story moving with witty dialogue or descriptive action. A real mystery with a surprise ending. Be sure to get this book for a good read.”
author: Anna Celeste Burke
